SELECT id, title, regdate, publisher, contents FROM community where id = #{communityId}
SELECT id, title, regdate, publisher, contents FROM community order by id desc limit 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community (title, regdate, publisher, contents) VALUES (#{title}, now(), #{publisher}, #{contents})
mapper.update: UPDATE community set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, update_date = now() where id = #{id};
